channel.title: TF2 keeps crashing
channel.description:
no idea why. just come to my attention in the past 2 days, and it's getting more and more frequent. please helps me :frowning:
cheers.

item.title: TF2 keeps crashing
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
try some console commands… mat_dxlevel 81? mat_forcehardwaresync 0?

Try to see if it’s the same map that crashes or if it’s usually right after someone joins the game, it could be a corrupted file in the game directory.

item.title: TF2 keeps crashing
item.dc:creator: blackout
item.description:
Mango Assassin:

Help us, by helping yourself, there could be a hundred reasons why it’s crashing, narrow it down, have you done any changes to your system or game setting’s lately? etc.

no changes whatsoever- that’s why I said ‘no idea’

Ramirezoid:

It is most likely crashing because it is a broken mess that you will never have fun playing, and your computer is aware of this.

burn the heretic!

intooblivion:

Experimenting in selling fake items for real world prices.

Anyway, is there any kind of error message?

It has one of those ‘HL2 .EXE has stopped working- windows is checking for a
solution to the problem’ which, of course, it fails to do.

intooblivion:

Also at least tell us the reason for the crash,

refer to the above:

No idea

it says it in details when it says programs aren’t responding or need to be closed.
[/QUOTE]
yeah, not this time. just the error message and ultimately a loss of any gamage.

Read full topic
